pyramid.translation[0].definitions[0].de: a large stone building with four triangular (=three-sided) walls that slope in to a point at the top, especially in Egypt and Central America
pyramid.translation[0].definitions[1].de: a system, society, company etc that is organized in different levels, so that there is a small number of people at the top and a much larger number of people at the bottom
pyramid.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: different levels of the management pyramid
At the bottom of the pyramid are the poor.
pyramid.translation[0].definitions[2].de: a pile of objects that have been put into the shape of a pyramid
pyramid.translation[0].definitions[3].de: an object shaped like a pyramid
pyramid.translation[1].definitions[0].de: an organization with only a few people at the top, who have a lot of power and influence over those below them
